com.neoworks.mpeg
Class MPEGStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.neoworks.mpeg.MPEGStream
public final class MPEGStream
extends java.lang.Object

This class parses an MPEG audio bitstream and represents the resulting MPEG data "file".

Author:
Nigel Atkinson (nigel@neoworks.com)
, micah
